name: RoShamBo
description: Welcome to RoShamBo arena! A brand new FREE arena fighting game, based on a classic rock-paper-scissors! Choose your character out of dozens unique looks, customize your gear, fight other players, knock their teeth out and become the best in RoShamBo Arena!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP SP3/ Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz or faster processor Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM or higher with OpenGL 1.5 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
